item.title: MKS INSTRUMENTS INC 10-K
item.description: MKS INSTRUMENTS INC, which is in the Industrial Instruments For Measurement, Display, And Control [3823] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 14, 2023 had 42742 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
